intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users often search this when looking for ways to optimize their budget or before renewing their insurance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's financial expertise to provide cost-saving strategies.

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance terms and rules
intents.user_motivation: Users want to demystify complex insurance jargon and rules.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing policies or trying to make informed decisions.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Simplify complex terms using ING's trusted voice.

intents.sub_intent: mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid common pitfalls and protect themselves financially.
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing issues with claims or before contacting an adjuster.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's customer-centric approach to financial education.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to compare options and find the most suitable policy.
intents.search_context: Users search this when actively shopping for insurance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's expertise in financial products and personalized recommendations.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can position itself as a trusted advisor for financial efficiency.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive guide that combines cost-saving tips with common mistakes to avoid.

sub_intents: understanding key insurance terms and rules
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's reputation for simplifying complex financial topics.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop educational content that explains insurance concepts and helps users make informed decisions.

quick_wins: Create a listicle on cost-saving insurance tips.
